mapper.insert: insert into estimate(estimate_purpose, estimate_progress, estimate_agegroup, estimate_ugender, estimate_mgender, estimate_day, estimate_time, estimate_desireregion, estimate_user_num, estimate_up_category_code, estimate_category_code) values (#{estimatePurpose}, #{estimateProgress}, #{estimateAgegroup} , #{estimateUgender}, #{estimateMgender}, #{estimateDay}, #{estimateTime}, #{estimateDesireregion}, #{estimateUserNum}, #{estimateUpCategoryCode}, #{estimateCategoryCode})
mapper.delete: delete from estimate order by estimate_num desc limit 1
mapper.select: select category_name from category where category_code = #{estimateCategoryCode} and up_category_code = #{estimateUpCategoryCode}
